The following are CSS style extensions to the xaringan (or xaringan -- dukeslides) presentation styles

  • Orange Splash page
    • This extension is intended to provide an alternative splash screen (the .inverse option) to dukeslides. The dark duke blue default is replaced with bright orange. This style should be used simultaneously with the duke-blue style
  • Creative Commons licensing CSS style and fonts
  • Captions for Figures Demonstrates how to integrate the figcaptions HTML/CSS style
